GoolagScanner::Scanner

GoolagScanner::Scanner Class Reference

Scanner, the complete process. Scans a Dork, independent of a IScanProvider, parses its results, and keeps the results and the status fo this scan. More...

DorkDone ResultDork [get]
 Gets the DorkDone after the scan, with the result, status, etc. If there is more than one result, this DorkDone is the start of a single linked list, ended with null.

Detailed Description

Scanner, the complete process. Scans a Dork, independent of a IScanProvider, parses its results, and keeps the results and the status fo this scan.

Property Documentation

DorkDone GoolagScanner::Scanner::ResultDork [get]

Gets the DorkDone after the scan, with the result, status, etc. If there is more than one result, this DorkDone is the start of a single linked list, ended with null.
